website_summaries.verdict: Provides strong hold without any stiffness, tangling, or stickiness.
pros: Holds well without leaving your hair stiff and crunchy
cons: Some have complained of their bottles getting clogged and refusing to spray

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you get the right product.
customer_reviews.text: If you order this product and you do not have "Original Formula" on the can, you've gotten the replacement by the manufacturer. It's terrible. No hold whatsoever. The can must have "Original Formula" on it to be the right stuff. I know from experience at the salon.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Kinnamon

customer_reviews.title: It holds my very fine hair, but easily brushes out and keeps down ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used Sebastian Shaper for many years. I have on an occasion tried other hairsprays, but quickly returned to Sebastain Shaper. It holds my very fine hair, but easily brushes out and keeps down frizz during humid weather that we have in Cincinnati throughout our summers. Holds, but keeps a more natural look. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann Vaught

customer_reviews.title: Another defective can - useless
customer_reviews.text: This product is okay -- when you can get it to spray out. I had a previous can with the same problem, where the sprayer stopped working even though the can was still almost full (that one was purchased from a salon). I decided to order another can here, and still have the exact same problem. At first it sprayed well. Then it sprayed at about 50%. Now it has stopped spraying completely. So, I'm stuck with another full can of hairspray that won't spray! I see others have complained about this problem as well. When I call the "money back guarantee" number on the can, the manufacturer says they will not cover products purchased on Amazon. So, buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Addict

customer_reviews.title: DEFECTIVE CAN
customer_reviews.text: Spray nozzle DOESN'T work! I got this a while back and just started using it last week...or trying to. The nozzle only works at (maybe) a 50% level that these are supposed to. I've used this product for probably 20 years so I'm very familiar with it. I tried soaking the nozzle in case it was just clogged and even replaced it with the one from a new can I bought...no luck. I'm hoping the seller sees this review and reaches out to me. I couldn't find a way to contact them from my order history. If you replace the can, I'm happy to change my review accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: TNGator

customer_reviews.title: Best Hairspray EVER
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? I think this is the best hairspray for people with fine hair. I personally like a more dry spraying hairspray that doesn't clump up on my hair and this does the job. It's touchable but still offers just the right amount of hold and doesn't make you look like your hair is a helmet. Great stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent spray!
customer_reviews.text: This product speaks for itself! It is very light yet it holds up for hours. The one thing I would suggest as it was suggested to me: Keep it upside down in order to keep the nozzle from sticking.
customer_reviews.author: Reliable Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite hairspray is Sebastian Shaper !!!
customer_reviews.text: The Sebastian Shaper hairspray is my favorite hairspray. (I don't care for the Shaper "Plus") I spray my hair liberally, wait a minute for it to dry, then lightly brush or comb over my hair, and it holds it in place longer than any other spray. It doesn't weigh my hair down or make my hair feel wet, but still holds. No strong smell either. My husband likes to use it, also.
customer_reviews.author: trnscrpshn

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: One of the best I have tried. Hair still shines, but style holds through day & eve with minor touch-up. I am a real estate broker,, so I am in & out of the car constantly & that means-wind, rain, humidity, sweat-yes-sweat- I work my butt off :) -so it's fair to say, I put my hair products to the test. It sucks even you buy something & you'r hair goes to crap before you even really get started with your day!
customer_reviews.author: PowerBuyer

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't smell strong like most hair spray products.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It's light enough that I don't feel like I'm wearing a helmet and it has a very mild fragrance that isn't obnoxious and that doesn't last long. The hold is somewhat light, which is what I want.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I typically love this product and I have been using it for years. I just unwrapped my most recent purchase today and the aerosole isn’t working on the hairspray. It spits out a little and then totally stops. This product isn’t eligible for returns. 😡
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Great hairspray to control hair that frizzes in humidity.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this spray for several years and have found it to be the best in controlling my frizzy hair especially after straightening with a flat iron. It holds in place but can be easily combed to soften any stiffness that you may want to eliminate. My only complaint is that every so often a can is defective and won't spray properly if at all. When this happens I have found the sellers on amazon have quickly sent me a replacement. I have tried similar products but always come back to Sebastian re-shaper strong hold hairspray.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzyrn

customer_reviews.title: Sprayer quits working!
customer_reviews.text: I have order this item twice. Both times, after I have successfully used it several times, the sprayer completely quits working. I have just thrown out my second can, with more than half of the product left in it. I have liked the product, which was recommended by a former stylist because I do not like stiff sprays or stiff hair. Now I have to find something else that will hold without putting a plastic shield over my hair.
customer_reviews.author: suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Sprayer malfunctions every time!
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this product for years and years but the last several cans I have purchased only spray for a while before they refuse to spray any longer. Amazon will ship TO you but will not allow returns (I get it) so I advise you not to purchase here. I now have two cans 2/3 full that I will have to toss because it won't work. I love this brand but will have to find something new!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Save Your Money!
customer_reviews.text: This spray is great! It's light and you can run your fingers through your hair. However, the bottle is crap. The nozzle will stop working at some point. I've purchased this product twice and both times the spray function shut down on me. The first time I was able to get through 1/2 the bottle. The second time, it shut down after 3 uses. It's frustrating to have this happen once let alone twice. Save your $20 and purchase a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: AZ

customer_reviews.title: My new FAVORITE hair spray !!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product ! I have fine, thin hair that needs a volume boost, so I use this while styling, then finish with it to hold my style. It allows my hair some natural movement while still holding your style. It is very easy to brush through so I will spray my hair while styling to give my hair some root boosting volume, but then can brush through to spray another area. Your hair still feels soft after you apply it, unlike most sprays that make your hair feel crunchy. This product works at every stage of styling your hair, worth every penny spent on it.
customer_reviews.author: Karin B

customer_reviews.title: Nozzle needs reengineering..
customer_reviews.text: Sebastian is my favorite hairspray. It's light, yet holds your hair in place. My only gripe is the nozzle. This is the second can I've bought which has a nozzle that quit working. I ran it under hot water thinking it was clogged, which didn't help. I took the nozzle cap off and pressed the nozzle tube underneath to find that's the problem. I have over 3/4 of a can I can't use. Rediculous!
customer_reviews.author: Shoppermom

customer_reviews.title: Need this to give me a lasting styling ...
customer_reviews.text: A great product to give your hair style ‘memory’! I have been using this product for years; used by my stylist also when styling my hair ... used before a final hair spray and my style will last a good week until my next appointment. Great for fine hair that needs some volume and reassurance your style will hold for days. Helps hold during humid days ... love this product!
customer_reviews.author: B. Schumann

customer_reviews.title: The product is defective and not as promoted
customer_reviews.text: I used this spray maybe 4 times, and then the spray delivery part of the can did not work. I tried a couple of things to get it to work, and was unsuccessful. Also, the spray does not provide a brushable style, as advertised. The spray is not touchable, nor moveable. Very disappointing! The can is practically full, and I cannot determine any way to return product based on Amazon's web site. With CoVid19 virus in full swing as of early March in the U.S., I did not get to use this product as much as I ordinarily would have. I ordered the product February 5th, and didn't start using it right away.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A Lazar

customer_reviews.title: Works great but there are cheaper alternatives.
customer_reviews.text: This hairspray really holds your hair in place, it does it's job but it's very sticky and you'll notice that if you spray too much in your hair it will become very hard, but it's hairspray so that's expected. I'm giving it four stars because I've used other hairsprays that work just as well as this one for half the price, the only difference I've seen between this and cheaper alternatives is the smell. This hairspray smells less chemically than other comparable brands.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Elander

customer_reviews.title: Best smelling brushable hairspray without stiffness
customer_reviews.text: This is a lightweight brushable spray that has great hold without any stiffness. It smells great and lasts for hours. I've tried many hairsprays but Re-Shaper is the best I've found. I carry the small size spray in my car and purse and the large can at home. My husband uses it as well. Best one he's used as well. It doesn't take much and holds without being stiff and can even be brushed. Very good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mari G. H.

customer_reviews.title: Best hairspray for men
customer_reviews.text: Perfect travel size. Applies clean without being tacky, allows for last minute movement, never gets "crunchy", and holds all day. Great for those days where your hair needs to behave.
customer_reviews.author: B. Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Great hairspray
customer_reviews.text: I have fine, thin hair, with a very sensitive scalp. My hairdresser recommended this spray for me. I've been using it for over a year and like it more than any other spray I've tried. It's not too stiff and gives a pretty good hold, without irritating my scalp.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Denizen

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I believe this is a counterfeit product. The container does not match my others. Smell different, sprays different, product does not work the same. I don’t believe the correct authentic product is made in Germany. It’s made by Wella. I never thought I could receive counterfeit products from Amazon. I will do more research from now on . OBTW. I TOSSED THIS PRODUCT FROM THIS SELLER
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: ... found that I can work well with I don't like how the sprays this is light enough and it ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used shaper for 30 years and Sebastian stop selling products in salons and stores for the most part so find to get on Amazon for this price was a real treat I order it on subscribe and save and I hope to never have a time where they don't make this product because it's the only one I found that I can work well with I don't like how the sprays this is light enough and it holds everything in place .
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: Brand is unbeatable - but would buy in store for cheaper
customer_reviews.text: I like that I can buy this through the ease of Amazon but I would buy from WalMart in the future. WalMart and Target sells the same item but nearly 50% larger and for half the price. The product itself though is the best hairspray for styling I've used. I have long thin silky hair that doesn't like to do much more than be straight. This paired with CHI heat protectant is the only way my hair will hold a curl and still be full of life and motion. Plus it smells super good!
customer_reviews.author: Carmel

customer_reviews.title: SEBASTIAN FIERCE HAIR SPRAY
customer_reviews.text: SEVERAL CANS THAT WERE IN USE WERE LEFT PARTIALLY EMPTY/FULL AND BECAME UNUSABLE.
customer_reviews.author: Vinnie Venosa

customer_reviews.title: Defective Nozzle a Common Problem
customer_reviews.text: I use this product every day and decided to purchase it online for cost savings. The sprayer of both cans acted defectively from day one. While air came out, hairspray did not. I tried to remedy this by running hot water over the nozzle but that was ineffective. When I tried to return the product I learned that is not within policy because the product is flammable. I am very dissatisfied with the product I purchased and feel as though I have no options to replace it. I simply want what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan carver

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this quite awhile ago and rarely use it but I tried using it last night and the nozzle won't work. I tried soaking the nozzle in the event it was clogged but nothing works. I expect the nozzle to work until the can is empty! I went back and read other reviews and see some people have the same problem. I too have used this product for over 30 years but never had this problem. I looked for a way to contact the seller but I don't see anyway to do that. I shop so much on Amazon and this is the first time that I have had a complaint. This is not an inexpensive product. Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Great Hair
customer_reviews.text: This product holds my style with not heaviness, stickiness. I have fine hair and short cut. I spray some in my hands and rub through my hair and shape it where I want it. Just run my fingers through my hair at any time to fluff and it stays. The best part feels like you have nothing on your hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never sticky!
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Sebastian is a high quality hair spray which allows your hair to stay in place yet look natural all day long, during COVID, during live online meetings, and before, when we actually went to work.
customer_reviews.author: uegdsw

customer_reviews.title: I wish I'd read the reviews before purchasing
customer_reviews.text: Sprayer is defective. It didn't work at all so it was a complete waste of time. I'm really wishing I'd read the other reviews before purchasing. I've learned a lesson - buy it from a store where the sprayer can be tested before purchase. This product costs the same as in stores.
customer_reviews.author: JND

customer_reviews.title: Great hairspray
customer_reviews.text: Like the hairspray very much however it arrived in a box w/o any packaging and also did not have a top on it at all. Don't know what happened to it also don't know if it was a full can or not must assume it was full but who knows with the cap missing. Strange.
customer_reviews.author: Willow

customer_reviews.title: It is named Fierce for a reason
customer_reviews.text: Great fragrance; titan holding power. If you don't want it stuck in place, don't spray it with this one. When I want just a little of its great holding power I spray it in the air in the shower and pass my head under the descending mist.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: meh.
customer_reviews.text: This hairspray produces a fine mist. However, I have noticed that it is almost impossible to use the right amount. I either don't use enough and fail to get proper hold, or I use too much and my hair gets sticky in the humidity (I live in the north east and it has been brutally humid). I use this mostly for keeping my bangs in place (light use). I prefer other bands I have used in the past and won't purchase this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: GingerMama

customer_reviews.title: Good hairspray. Doesn’t spray right.
customer_reviews.text: Good hairspray, it holds well. but something is wrong with the sprayer. It sprays a couple seconds then stops. It isn’t a plugged nozzle.
customer_reviews.author: JDot

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t smell good.
customer_reviews.text: It’s very nice. The mist is very light. Perfect for a little hold and maintain any run away hairs. The smell resembles the chemical smell of hairspray. If they added a unisex smell to it, it would be a top notch product. I don’t like the smell but it works.
customer_reviews.author: Erik K

customer_reviews.title: spray nozzle worked for only a few days
customer_reviews.text: despite soaking in hot water etc etc, it just wont spray correctly, sometimes wont stop spraying, sometimes barely sprays at all
customer_reviews.author: blueskris

customer_reviews.title: Great hair spray
customer_reviews.text: My favorite hair spray, salon prices or even other places sale it too, I couldn’t have saved money buying it elsewhere. Such great prices and I’ve been using Shaper Hair Spray for many yrs. it’s not stiff I love it cause you can brush your hair and it’s still soft with hair spray it’s very light weight. My friends love it too.
customer_reviews.author: Terenia Singletary

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great product The only issue I have is that the nozzle gets clogged quickly and it sprays in a weird direction after a few uses and it’s difficult to clean and get working properly. That said, it’s still usable.
customer_reviews.author: Gypsy J

customer_reviews.title: Best hairspray EVER’
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this hair spray! It’s the only one I will ever use, it holds better than most, and brushes out easily. Will always purchase this product as long as it is available.
customer_reviews.author: Ticklefoot

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE. This item doesn't seem authentic. I ...
customer_reviews.text: BUYER BEWARE. This item doesn't seem authentic. I recently purchased another can locally. The ingredients listed on this can list WATER as an ingredient, which is not on the can I purchased locally. The smell is also very different and most importantly the hairspray doesn't work...there is NO HOLD.
customer_reviews.author: AMN

customer_reviews.title: Re-shaper is wonderful!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the very best product I have ever used. It Re-invents hair styling!! Style holds up, soft, makes it look like you look and feel Confident!
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Love Sebastian hair spray
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using Sebastian for years and love it! The cap for the spray does not work correctly. It doesn’t spray a steady stream, it spritzed out very wet and goes in all different directions. Tried cleaning it out, thought the hole might have been clogged. It still didn’t work. I used a spray cap from an old can of hair spray and it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: Been using this stuff forever and i usually have to go searching for it and spending a lot more. Has a good universal scent and doesnt hold too tightly but maintains through 12 hour shifts. Its professional quality stuff, better than most of the cheaper junk.
customer_reviews.author: Devin Mayne

customer_reviews.title: It does not stink !
customer_reviews.text: I like that this product does not smell. I also like that it does not flake, nor does it leave the hair feeling sticky. I like it and will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: orlando

customer_reviews.title: Nice hold
customer_reviews.text: I have used this hairspray in the past and its a firm holding spray but a lightweight hold and not tacky or stiff. The hair is not weighted down at all.
customer_reviews.author: Candee k.

customer_reviews.title: Always come back to this!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this hairspray for years. I try other products on occasion but I always come back to this. It is light so doesn't weigh down my fine, thin hair yet it does the job, holds my hair in place. It doesn't leave my hair sticky or a film so I can go several days between washings. GREAT product!
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: easy to comb out and leaves no residue
customer_reviews.text: When I received it the top was scotch taped on and probably melted. It was very difficult to remove and I had to leave part of it stuck on If you have to scotch tape it I will not order it again So what if the top comes off in transporting it!!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for humid days!
customer_reviews.text: I love this hairspray bc it holds a style in place but doesn’t make my hair feel crunchy! It also holds up to summer humidity in South Carolina!
customer_reviews.author: Pumpitup

customer_reviews.title: Unscented with brushable hold
customer_reviews.text: I routinely use this spray primarily because it is unscented and it does not have a sticky residue. I can brush and restyle my hair after the spray. I have had issues with the spray opening plugging or not working on some cans but returns have been easy and it does not happen often enough for me to switch.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Strong hold
customer_reviews.text: It holds well but your hair will need to be washed after use. I use it on the last day before washing my hair and fixing my hair in a do that needs a stronger hold.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Hinton

customer_reviews.title: Very strong and tacky but not terrible!
customer_reviews.text: The hairspray smells fabulous but is VERY strong/tacky. The description says Strong Hold so it is as described, but stronger than I would like. I would advise to hold the bottle as far away as possible before spraying. It's still usable as long as you don't hold it too close.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn M

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with defective can
customer_reviews.text: The can I’d hairspray that I received was defective. I wanted to return it for a refund but I noticed that it can’t be returned. I’m highly disappointed. Please send another can or a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Justice

customer_reviews.title: Hairspray
customer_reviews.text: I love this hair spray it’s not too drying but it does hold firmly enough to keep my hair from moving anywhere throughout the night. It doesn’t make my hair look stiff or strange.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki Bebe

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this hairspray last year in Tjmaxx and I ran out so I decided to find it on Amazon. I honestly see no difference. If you're looking for a semi-strong & subtle hold with no weird sticky feeling, this is the hairspray for you!
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as shaper +
customer_reviews.text: I accidentally ordered this hairspray instead of the shaper + one. I have been using this hairspray for the last 5 days and I don't care for the smell and the hold is weak. I will keep it for emergency use only, but I can't wait until my shaper + one arrives today.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy A.

customer_reviews.title: Provides no hold at all
customer_reviews.text: Don't believe the positive reviews. This is the worst hair spray I have ever purchased. I have pretty thick hair, but this makes my hair wispy and fly away and does not hold. I have tried it on wet hair and after blow drying. Terrible both ways. Save your money as it is also expensive.
customer_reviews.author: kinsey

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy from amazon. Defective sprayer
customer_reviews.text: There's a reason why this product is cheaper on Amazon. The aerosol spray is defective like previous reviews. Buy the product itself is great. Lightweight spray, strong enough to last the entire day through humidity and wind, and no flakes. But the spray bottle from amazon is defective. Buy the hairspray from the store. Walgreens, CVS, or Target. You might pay a bit more but atleast you'll be able to use the entire bottle and not have a half to 3/4 full bottle that doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: matine yang

customer_reviews.title: A Great Hold for Fine Hair
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful hairspray for fine hair. Great for “weather”. Really holds without being sticky or giving helmet head.
customer_reviews.author: SMRF

customer_reviews.title: 2 cans and 2 dissapointments
customer_reviews.text: I always get this spray from amazon. However the latest purchase was a spray that wouldn't work, just fizzed out of the nozzle. I contacted amazon and the spray was replaced, worked great at first then did the same thing. I now have 2 almost full hairsprays and can't use them. Perhaps it was a bad batch. I wold sure like someone to give me and answer.
customer_reviews.author: Mamma J

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this hair spray for about 10 years. I love it. But this can stopped working after one spray. I have tried everything to get it working, but nothing has worked. Full can of spray with no way to use.
customer_reviews.author: Carla T. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Great hold and light weight
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this brand for years. It had become hard to find after my hair salon shut down so I was thrilled to find it here. It's a nice hold without being stiff and is great for styling. I can tease my hair and just pat in place.
customer_reviews.author: Edna Mckenzie

customer_reviews.title: Tried and true favorite
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this hairspray since the 90s. I’ve tried other hairsprays, and I always come back to this one. Medium hold, but leaves hair touchable. My husband, who has curly hair, even started using it and says he likes it a lot - this is saying a lot bc he’s a very low maintenance guy, but it keeps hair under control even when you use very little.
customer_reviews.author: melanie waszewski

customer_reviews.title: What's with the orange circle at the top of the can that states 'ORIGINAL'?
customer_reviews.text: I receive a can that had many (~15) dings and dents. And then the orange circle at the top of the can that states 'ORIGINAL'. I have been purchasing Shaper Plus for years and have never seen a can that looks like this or is in such poor condition.
customer_reviews.author: MDG

customer_reviews.title: FAKE, UNDOUBTEDLY FAKE!
customer_reviews.text: Super expensive and I’m certain it’s a knock off. I usually order this item from Sally’s but it was out of stock, so I decided to order it here. What a disaster! Don’t wast your money.
customer_reviews.author: Lovely-ness

customer_reviews.title: Mmm
customer_reviews.text: The product works fine but it came broken and it's not easy to use. Sometimes it get clogged and it's impossible to use if you don't clean it
customer_reviews.author: Yla

customer_reviews.title: Great  hairspray!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for years and was so happy to find it for a decent price on Amazon! It is the same product that I purchase at Ulta.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Great hairspray
customer_reviews.text: Love the hold of this hairspray. Not too stiff, but holds style well. Love that you can brush right through it
customer_reviews.author: Karen Williams

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff/no odor - guys don't want that
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for years. For me it's all about the scent because guys don't want to smell like hairspray. With Shaper it's barely noticeable and it holds perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sprayer never works
customer_reviews.text: This review isn't against the seller, but the product itself. The sprayer literally doesn't work. It's CRAP!!! I have a full bottle of hairspray and cannot use it!! This happens to every other bottle of this I buy, and I'm not sure why the manufacturer has not fixed this!!! You'll probably wonder why I keep buying it (it's because it's my FAVORITE hair spray and I can't find anything as good), but I guess I like taking the risk.... I'm done this time though.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Pauly

customer_reviews.title: You NEED to try this Hairspray
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this hair spray. I have used it for years because it is one of the Best sprays I have ever used. It combs out easy and leaves hair soft...
customer_reviews.author: Nonnie

customer_reviews.title: This is what I've been looking for!
customer_reviews.text: If you have been looking for hairspray that doesn't leave your hair feeling gunky, this is it! It is life changing to use this hairspray. I have never had hairspray I could use that didn't require me to wash my hair that night... now I can use this to hold my style well and still be able to brush if needed throughout the day and let my hair rest from excessive shampooing
customer_reviews.author: chrislee

customer_reviews.title: My Must Have
customer_reviews.text: Have used this hairspray for decades! It is the only one that works to hold your “Texas Hairdo”in the Houston Gulf Coast Humidity.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly S Ehlinger

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't tell you.
customer_reviews.text: Didnt work on my hair which is kinky and frizzy. Suave works better.
customer_reviews.author: anna venrick

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This product is excellent.....It makes your hair stay in place....and you can restyle it without any problem. I used this for many years and would highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Maryann Bonafiglia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Use small amount every day on colored hair. Not sticky or stiff. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: Susan L.

customer_reviews.title: Great hairspray
customer_reviews.text: My favorite hairspray! Love it because your hair feels clean after use. Medium hold. However, a little pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Hinton

customer_reviews.title: Great Hairspray for fine hair
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this hairspray. It has great hold yet I can brush through my hair with no sticky residue. Highly recommend. Considering a bottle lasts a few months, the price is very affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Scoobee

customer_reviews.title: Can died after a week.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for several years and this is the 2nd time the can has died. I will be looking for a different retailer or product.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: The Best Hair Spray there is!
customer_reviews.text: I buy this every year for my daughters Christmas stocking. There is no other spray she has every used and will continue to do so forever.....
customer_reviews.author: Suzieb

customer_reviews.title: Dry Freezed Hair
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a spray that allowed me to continue playing with my style after I sprayed it. Not going to happen. In fact, this is the strongest stuff I have ever used. A small spray of this would drop a fly in mid-flight.
customer_reviews.author: barbara lussier

customer_reviews.title: Best hairspray on market
customer_reviews.text: I’m a fan. I’ve tried everything and you can sculpt hair spray it, brush it, spray it again and it stays all day
customer_reviews.author: Chris  from Providence, RI

customer_reviews.title: Can't live with out my Shaper Zero!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Shaper Zero for a very long time. Recently I have found it difficult to get, the closest salon that sells it is about 30 mins away. The last few times I went to get some they were sold out. So I tried Amazon, and here it is! Perfect. This is the best hair spray EVER! It never feels sticky or makes your hair feel crunchy. After you use it, your hair stays in place and still feels soft, you can also brush through it very easy. The smell isn't the greatest but it dissipates quickly. In addition, it never leaves any reside in your hair like some other products. Try it, you will love it!
customer_reviews.author: B. Kays

customer_reviews.title: Good, but...
customer_reviews.text: After using the Sebastian hairspray for few months, I think it is very good to hold the hair naturally, I don't feel like sticky and stiff compared to other bands. The only one disadvantage for the hairspray is that the spray noddle would be clogged after couple months usage. I have to use the toothpick to remove it. However, I would still recommend this hairspray to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Z

customer_reviews.title: Best hairspray
customer_reviews.text: This hairspray is awesome. Lightweight and you can style your hair easily before it dries. Other hairspray dries too fast. This is by far the best hairspray you’ll ever use. I have used this for years. It spells really good too!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie G

customer_reviews.title: Hair spray
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for years and like it a great deal. Before deciding to look online, I bought this from the beauty/barber shops; but they are much more expensive there. My hair is very fine and this spray allows me to spray it on and then style it. It doesn't have a strong hold. It just allows you to spray and style. You would need the Shaper Plus for a stronger hold.
customer_reviews.author: S. W. Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Cans will not spray
customer_reviews.text: I should have read the reviews before buying. Cans will not spray. I've tried everything. I bought two cans and the sprayer is defective on both. I have two full cans of hairspray that I cannot use. I have contacted the seller and I am awaiting a response. My hairdresser recommended this spray and I have used it in the past. I know it is a good product, but it is no good to anyone if you can't get it out of the can.
customer_reviews.author: StationK7

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: I have loved this product and used it for 30 years. I wouldn't use anything else. It has the perfect balance of hold and flexibility.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My can't-live-without hairspray!
customer_reviews.text: I love Sebastian Shaper! The regular - not the Shaper Plus. I've been using this for over 20 years and it's the one hairspray that I cannot be without. I love that it goes on "dry" and that I can brush through it easily and restyle my hair if necessary. Because I have long hair, I don't shampoo it daily, so I also love that there is no hairspray build-up with Shaper. It shampoos out beautifully even after 2-3 days of daily use. But even though it brushes out easily and doesn't build up, it does hold well. Best. Hairspray. Ever.
customer_reviews.author: enjoytheview

customer_reviews.title: Remember to cap
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it’s because I left the cap off occasionally, but the sprayer clogged too many times. Too bad, because it held my style without looking stiff.
customer_reviews.author: gramercygal

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but it's nice
customer_reviews.text: It's expensive but I like it as I can still style it if I need to after spraying it on. Very lightweight
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: Ive used E V E R Y hair spray out there --and this by far works the best. I even use it to "set" my hair when I put rollers in because it gives it body.
customer_reviews.author: Andie

customer_reviews.title: Great light hairspray.
customer_reviews.text: Sebastian’s hairspray is the best value for the money. It is not heavy and sticky like some and you can rush through it. the scent is delightful.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda R. Trogden

customer_reviews.title: Hairspray won't spray and I can't return it after 30 days
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a back up hairspray and did not have the need to use it until well after 30 days. I should have been suspicious as when the package arrived, the canister was sticky as if it had leaked hairspray. I didn't think much of it and put it away. Now, however, when I have the need to use it, it won't spray. It just spits and sputters and I can't spray my hair. I have tried cleaning the nozzle, but to no avail, and now I find out that I only had 30 days from purchase to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This hairspray leaved TERRIBLE sicking revolting order after it is applied
customer_reviews.text: This hairspray leaved TERRIBLE sicking revolting order after it is applied. I used it for the first time yesterday before going our. The spray leaves a residue in the air that gets into ones mouth and is bad. People outside the restroom were complaining of its odor.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen R. Herndon

customer_reviews.title: light
customer_reviews.text: This spray holds well without being stiff or sticky and it does not leave a build up. Very fine mist which I like. The scent is very light.
customer_reviews.author: ULA

customer_reviews.title: Best Hairspray Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love this hairspray! There is enough hold but not too much. When I spray, the product goes on without buildup or clumping.
customer_reviews.author: SBN

customer_reviews.title: Best Hairspray Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love this hairspray. I spray my hair after styling, run a comb through it and spray it again. My hair stays in place. The best thing about this hairspray is that my hair still feels soft and flowy. My hair doesn't feel crunchy or sticky. I would recommend this hairspray to anyone. :)
customer_reviews.author: Anita P

customer_reviews.title: Sprayer clogs - unusable
customer_reviews.text: I love your hairspray, but I don't know why I keep going back - it is just too much work - constantly clogs and isn't usable. I know you instruct to store upside down, clean out the nozzle, etc., but at some point it just stops. It was better for a while, but the two I ordered brought back all the poor experiences again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I can use shaper hair spray to hold my hair style without the unwanted residue
customer_reviews.text: Holds my hair style without weighing it down. Does not leave unwanted residue in my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen R. Thomas

product_meta.title: Sebastian Professional Shaper Hairspray
product_meta.description:
Style:Shaper 55%The Original Sebastian SHAPER hairspray that set the standards by which hairsprays are measured. Modern look, same great formula & fragrance! This flash-dry brushable hairspray has a lightweight flexible control that defies gravity. SHAPER hairspray was born out of a desire to free the hair from stiffness and let it move. At a show in L.A., the massive can was introduced onstage as the first hairspray that can be sprayed upside down, moving the hair and lifting it. Shaper is a modern icon. It is everywhere: in the salon, behind the scenes on motion picture and television sets, at home and in your bag, transcending fashion, trends, and generations. It remains today one of the most-loved styling products in the industry. 

 * Professional HAIRSPRAY for Women and Men
 * SEBASTIAN SHAPER has control so light that you hardly know it's there
 * TOUCHABLE, MOVABLE STYLE with flexible hold and a satiny finish
 * Applies cleanly on hair
 * Flexible Volume and Brushable Style
 * For best results, Spray on damp hair to help create your style, Re-Spray after styling for increased hold
 * For all hair types



ABOUT SEBASTIAN
SEBASTIAN inspires the artist inside everyone with new techniques, providing new professional styling and hair care products for great new looks.

specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
